articles.description: Concerns have been raised by health care leaders in North Carolina over the state’s COVID-19 vaccine rollout. Caption: WLOS. Two state health associations, the North Carolina Healthcare Association and the North Carolina Association Of Local Health Dire…

articles.author: Kelly Tyko
articles.title: McDonald's bringing back Spicy Chicken McNuggets, Mighty Hot Sauce for a limited time starting Feb. 1 - USA TODAY
articles.description: McDonald's Spicy Chicken McNuggets are coming back starting Feb. 1 for a limited time. Get a free 6-piece on McDelivery with DoorDash orders.

articles.author: Alexis Benveniste, CNN Business
articles.title: Godiva is closing or selling all of its stores in the United States - CNN
articles.description: Luxury chocolatier Godiva is getting out of the brick and mortar business.
